column1: william e. hygh| william e. hygh
column6: 1929 to the late glenn and mabel (hibler) hygh in st. joseph
column7: mo. he was a us navy veteran during the korean war where he was a radar operator. he worked for gm truck & bus division for 30 years retiring as a general superintendent in 1987. he was a member of st. susanna catholic church
column9: st. vincent de. paul society and aarp as a tax preparer. william is survived by his wife
column10: elizabeth ann (murtaugh) hygh. they were married on november 26
column12: mo. he is also survived by two sons
column13: mark (colleen) and tim (karen) hygh; a daughter
column14: mary hygh; 7 grandchildren and 5 great grandchildren. he was preceded in death by his son
column15: patrick hygh. a funeral mass will be held at st. susanna catholic church in plainfield
column18: 2015 at 10:00 am. visitation will be from 4:00 to 8:00 pm on monday
column19: june 15 in the hampton-gentry funeral home
column20: plainfield. entombment with military honors will be in maple hill cemetery
